name: Turrets N' Crappy servers
description:
A multiplayer one week project i have made, the "game" was never intended to be user friendly. I might come back to the game later this year and make it actually playable.

Starting out i had no idea how to make a multiplayer prototype whatsoever. After finishing this one week personal challenge, I can proudly say that i still don't know how to make a multiplayer prototype.

I have already seen all the glitches and bugs in the game, some i fixed , some i left because they would eat too much time . there is no need to feedback about how bad it is.

A huge thank you to PUN for creating the amazing api, it's not your fault that the api fell into MY hands.
